newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia's Agroprombank to be state agent in farming.
newsitem.headline: Russia's Agroprombank to be state agent in farming.

text.p: A government commission on financial and credit policies approved a bill on Agroprombank, making it the state's agent in the agricultural sector, a bank spokesman said on Tuesday.
Andrei Cherpanov told Reuters the government would own a controlling stake in the bank, which handled credits to the farm sector in the Soviet period.
Many companies in the agricultural sector would transfer their accounts to the bank, he said.
